description: Configuration for planets that spawn in the world.

propertyNames.description: Planet config names must be a sequence of basic alphanumeric characters without a space.

minGrav.description: The minimum value of gravity for this planet.

maxGrav.description: The maximum value of gravity for this planet.

propertyNames.description: Decoration config names must be the gestalt ID of the decoration texture.

density.description: The frequency of placement for this decoration on the planet.

szMin.description: The minimum size of this decoration.

szMax.description: The maximum size of this decoration.

allowFlip.description: True if the decoration could be drawn flipped, false otherwise.

cloudTexs.description: The root gestalt ID of the textures for the planet's clouds.

groundTexs.description: The root gestalt ID of the JSON config and textures for the planet ground.

sky.description: The configuration for the colors in the planet's sky.

rows.description: The number of iterations performed during planet generation.

smoothLandscape.description: True if smoothing should be performed on the planet terrain, false otherwise.

trading.description: The configuration of the trading stations that spawn on the planet.

ships.description: A list of ships that the player can change their ship to.

hardOnly.description: True if the planet should only be spawned when the parent system is in hard mode. False by default.

easyOnly.description: True if the planet should only be spawned when the parent system is in easy mode, False by default.

vec2.$comment: 2 float values separated by one or more spaces, ints also accepted

hull.description: Id of the hull of this ship.

money.description: Starting money for the player on spawn.

density.description: The density of these ships present on the planet. N/A for 'station'

items.description: Space separated list of items the ship possesses on spawn. See /docs/items.txt for a more detailed explanation.

color.description: Color can be defined in the form `rrr ggg bbb`, `rrr ggg bbb aaa`, `hsb hhh sss bbb` or `hsb hhh sss bbb aaa`
